import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useContext, useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Helmet, HelmetProvider } from "react-helmet-async"; import { AuthContext } from "../Helpers/AuthContext"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import Heading from "../Components/Heading"; import { BiChevronRight, BiChevronLeft } from "react-icons/bi"; function Settings() { const { authState, setAuthState } = useContext(AuthContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { if (!localStorage.getItem("accessToken")) { navigate("/signup"); } }); const [showSubContent, setshowSubContent] = useState(0); const subContentStatus = (currentSubContent) => { setshowSubContent(currentSubContent); } function showPageContent() {} function hidePageContent() {} return ( Settings | Zom - IN
